## Description

```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
library(data.table)
library(dplyr)
set.seed(1510)
```

## Parse results

```{r parse_results, echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
# Input data
input_dir <- '/home/j.aguirreplans/Projects/Scipher/SampleSize/data/out'
type_counts = "reads"

# Define result dataframes
cols_topology = c("method", "dataset", "type_dataset", "type_tcga_tissue", "size", "rep", "threshold", "num_nodes", "num_edges", "av_degree", "av_path_length", "av_clustering_coef", "num_components", "num_lcc_nodes", "num_lcc_edges", "lcc_z", "lcc_pvalue", "max_k", "num_main_core_nodes", "num_main_core_edges")
topology_df = data.frame(matrix(ncol=length(cols_topology),nrow=0, dimnames=list(NULL, cols_topology)))
cols_ppi = c("method", "dataset", "type_dataset", "type_tcga_tissue", "size", "rep", "threshold", "num_ppi_nodes", "num_ppi_edges", "fraction_ppi_nodes", "fraction_ppi_edges", "num_ppi_main_core_nodes", "num_ppi_main_core_edges", "fraction_ppi_main_core_nodes", "fraction_ppi_main_core_edges")
ppi_results_df = data.frame(matrix(ncol=length(cols_ppi),nrow=0, dimnames=list(NULL, cols_ppi)))
cols_essential = c("method", "dataset", "type_dataset", "type_tcga_tissue", "size", "rep", "threshold", "num_essential_genes", "fraction_essential_genes", "num_components", "num_lcc_nodes", "fraction_essential_lcc_nodes", "num_lcc_edges", "lcc_z", "lcc_pvalue")
essential_gene_results_df = data.frame(matrix(ncol=length(cols_essential),nrow=0, dimnames=list(NULL, cols_essential)))
cols_disease = c("method", "dataset", "type_dataset", "type_tcga_tissue", "size", "rep", 'threshold', 'disease', 'disease_class', 'num_disease_genes', 'fraction_disease_genes', 'num_disease_components', 'num_disease_lcc_nodes', 'fraction_disease_lcc_nodes', 'num_disease_lcc_edges', "disease_lcc_z", "disease_lcc_pvalue")
disease_gene_results_df <- setNames(data.frame(matrix(ncol = length(cols_disease), nrow = 0)), cols_disease)

for(dataset in c('scipher', 'gtex', 'tcga')){
  if (dataset == 'tcga'){
    types_tcga_tissue = c('tumor', 'normal')
  } else {
    types_tcga_tissue = c(NA)
  }
  for (type_tcga_tissue in types_tcga_tissue){
    if (is.na(type_tcga_tissue)){
      subdatasets_dir = paste(input_dir, paste("analysis_", dataset, sep=""), type_counts, sep="/")
    } else {
      subdatasets_dir = paste(input_dir, paste("analysis_", dataset, sep=""), type_counts, type_tcga_tissue, sep="/")
    }
    types_dataset = list.files(subdatasets_dir)
    for(type_dataset in types_dataset){
      result_files = list.files(paste(subdatasets_dir, type_dataset, sep="/"))
      for(result_file in result_files){
        input_file = paste(subdatasets_dir, type_dataset, result_file, sep="/")
        info_file = gsub("_analysis_topology.txt|_analysis_essential_genes.txt|_analysis_disease_genes.txt|_analysis_ppi.txt","",result_file)
        file_split = strsplit(info_file, split="_")[[1]]
        if (("threshold" %in% file_split) | ("edges" %in% file_split)){
          method = file_split[1]
          threshold = as.numeric(file_split[(length(file_split))])
          size = file_split[(length(file_split)-4)]
          r = file_split[(length(file_split))-2]
        } else {
          method = file_split[1]
          size = file_split[(length(file_split)-2)]
          r = file_split[(length(file_split))]
        }
        if(r=="samples"){
          size = "all"
          r = NA
        } else {
          size = as.numeric(size)
          r = as.numeric(r)
        }
        individual_df <- fread(input_file)
        if(grepl("analysis_topology", result_file, fixed = TRUE)){
          topology_df <- rbind(topology_df, cbind(data.frame(method=rep(method, nrow(individual_df)), dataset=rep(dataset, nrow(individual_df)), type_dataset=rep(type_dataset, nrow(individual_df)), type_tcga_tissue=rep(type_tcga_tissue, nrow(individual_df)), size=rep(size, nrow(individual_df)), rep=rep(r, nrow(individual_df))), individual_df))
        } else if(grepl("analysis_ppi", result_file, fixed = TRUE)){
          ppi_results_df <- rbind(ppi_results_df, cbind(data.frame(method=rep(method, nrow(individual_df)), dataset=rep(dataset, nrow(individual_df)), type_dataset=rep(type_dataset, nrow(individual_df)), type_tcga_tissue=rep(type_tcga_tissue, nrow(individual_df)), size=rep(size, nrow(individual_df)), rep=rep(r, nrow(individual_df))), individual_df))
        } else if(grepl("analysis_essential_genes", result_file, fixed = TRUE)){
          essential_gene_results_df <- rbind(essential_gene_results_df, cbind(data.frame(method=rep(method, nrow(individual_df)), dataset=rep(dataset, nrow(individual_df)), type_dataset=rep(type_dataset, nrow(individual_df)), type_tcga_tissue=rep(type_tcga_tissue, nrow(individual_df)), size=rep(size, nrow(individual_df)), rep=rep(r, nrow(individual_df))), individual_df))
        } else if(grepl("analysis_disease_genes", result_file, fixed = TRUE)){
          disease_gene_results_df <- rbind(disease_gene_results_df, cbind(data.frame(method=rep(method, nrow(individual_df)), dataset=rep(dataset, nrow(individual_df)), type_dataset=rep(type_dataset, nrow(individual_df)), type_tcga_tissue=rep(type_tcga_tissue, nrow(individual_df)), size=rep(size, nrow(individual_df)), rep=rep(r, nrow(individual_df))), individual_df))
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

```{r output_dataset, echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
# Check number of nodes and edges in complete graph for each dataset
cols = c("dataset", "total_num_nodes", "total_num_edges")
numbers_df = data.frame(matrix(ncol=length(cols),nrow=0, dimnames=list(NULL, cols)))

# For scipher
scipher_data_dir = '/home/j.aguirreplans/Projects/Scipher/SampleSize/data/Dec2021'
genes_filt_dir = paste(scipher_data_dir, '00_data/genes_from_rnaseq_filtered_files_by_group', sep='/')
groups = unique((topology_df %>% filter(dataset == "scipher"))$type_dataset)
for (group in groups){
  genes_dataset_file = paste(genes_filt_dir, paste("scipher_rnaseq_gene_info_", group, ".csv", sep=''), sep='/')
  genes_dataset_df = fread(genes_dataset_file)
  num_genes = length(unique((genes_dataset_df %>% filter(enough_counts == TRUE) %>% unique())$HGNC_Symbol)) # Total number of genes
  num_edges = num_genes*(num_genes-1)/2 # Total number of edges
  numbers_df <- rbind(numbers_df, data.frame(dataset=paste("scipher", group, sep=":"), total_num_nodes=num_genes, total_num_edges=num_edges))
}

# For tcga
gdc_dir = '/work/ccnr/j.aguirreplans/Databases/TCGA/2022-07-27-Dataset/TCGA'
output_dir = paste(gdc_dir, 'out', sep='/')
projects = unique((topology_df %>% filter(dataset == "tcga"))$type_dataset)
types_tcga_tissue = unique((topology_df %>% filter(dataset == "tcga"))$type_tcga_tissue)
#projects = c("TCGA", "TCGA-BRCA", "TCGA-UCEC")
for (project_id in projects){
  for (type_tcga_tissue in types_tcga_tissue){
    genes_filt_dir = paste(output_dir, type_counts, type_tcga_tissue, 'filter_genes_low_counts/genes_filtered_files_by_project', sep='/')
    genes_project_file = paste(genes_filt_dir, paste("rnaseq_gene_info_", project_id, ".csv", sep=''), sep='/')
    if(file.exists(genes_project_file)){
      genes_dataset_df = fread(genes_project_file)
      num_genes = length(unique((genes_dataset_df %>% filter(enough_counts == TRUE) %>% unique())$HGNC_Symbol)) # Total number of genes
      num_edges = num_genes*(num_genes-1)/2 # Total number of edges
      dataset = paste("tcga", project_id, sep=":")
      if(type_tcga_tissue=="normal"){
        dataset = paste("tcga:", project_id, "-normal", sep="")
      }
      numbers_df <- rbind(numbers_df, data.frame(dataset=dataset, total_num_nodes=num_genes, total_num_edges=num_edges))
    }
  }
}
```
